org.netbeans.core.multitabs

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.multitabs.Settings

  • public final class Settings
extends Object
    Read-only access to multi-tab settings.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        public static Settings getDefault()
        Returns:
        The one and only instance.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        True if multi-tabs are enabled, false otherwise.

      • getTabsLocation

        public int getTabsLocation()
        Returns:
        One of JTabbedPane.TOP BOTTOM LEFT or RIGHT constants.
        See Also:
        JTabbedPane.getTabPlacement()

      • isShowFullPath

        public boolean isShowFullPath()
        Returns:
        True to show full file path of currently selected document.

      • isSameProjectSameColor

        public boolean isSameProjectSameColor()
        Returns:
        True to use same color for all tabs from the same project.

      • isSortDocumentListByProject

        public boolean isSortDocumentListByProject()
        Returns:
        True to sort drop-down document list by project.

      • isTabRowPerProject

        public boolean isTabRowPerProject()
        Returns:
        True to show one row of tabs per project.

      • getRowCount

        public int getRowCount()
        Returns:
        Maximum tab row count.
